jog.title: Jogging
jog.keyboardShortcuts:
Arrows: X/Y movement
Page Up/Down: Z movement
[ / ]: decrease / increase step
Continuous mode: hold key for continuous movement

zeroGoto.title: Zero / Go To / Probe Z
zeroGoto.probeFailedMsg: The probe did not detect a surface within the search range.
zeroGoto.probeCircuitOpen: Touch tool to plate to test circuit
zeroGoto.probeCircuitContact: Circuit OK — remove tool before probing
zeroGoto.probeZTitle: Automatically detect the workpiece surface and set Z0. Requires circuit test first.
zeroGoto.probeThicknessTitle: Exact thickness of your touch plate, measured with calipers (0.1–50 mm)
zeroGoto.safeHeightTitle: Z clearance height for manual operations only: Go to XY Zero, retract after Probe Z, and probe offset calculation. Has no effect during G-code job execution.

overrides.title: Overrides
overrides.feedTooltip: Adjusts cutting feed rate (G1/G2/G3) from 10% to 200% of the programmed value.
overrides.spindleTooltip: Adjusts spindle speed (PWM mode only) from 10% to 200% of the programmed RPM.
overrides.rapidTooltip: Adjusts G0 rapid positioning speed: 25%, 50%, or 100%. Only 3 fixed levels supported by GRBL.

dro.workPosTitle: Work position (WPos) — coordinates relative to the workpiece zero (G54). Click to show MachinePos.
dro.machinePosTitle: Machine position (MPos) — absolute coordinates from the physical reference point (home). Click to show WorkPos.

spindle.title: Spindle
spindle.ccwTitle: Counter-clockwise (M4) — used for tapping or reverse-cut tools
spindle.tooltipPwm: The spindle is driven by GRBL's PWM signal. RPM values and overrides control the actual speed.
spindle.tooltipRelay: The spindle is on a relay output (ON/OFF). Actual speed is always maximum, overrides have no effect on physical speed.
spindle.tooltipManual: Speed is set by a manual potentiometer. Displayed values are indicative (GRBL), actual speed depends on physical setting.
spindle.modeBadgeRelay: Relay mode: ON/OFF only, speed not controlled
spindle.modeBadgeManual: Manual mode: speed set by physical potentiometer

gcode.probeWarningMsg: Z0 has not been set by probe in this session. Start anyway?
gcode.spindleWarningMsg: The spindle is not running. Start the job anyway?
gcode.spindleReadyMsg: Spindle is running. Start the job?
